files.title: Overview
files.summary: The shared memory descriptor describes the properties of multiplicand matrix in shared memory including its location in the shared memory of the current *CTA*. It is a 64-bit value contained in a register with the following layout:

files.title: 9.7.16.4.1.1. Target ISA Note
files.summary: * The byte address mode for the leading dimension stride is supported on `sm_103a`.
